scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-prompts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-prompts/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-prompts-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-prompts-web run build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-prompts/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-prompts/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-prompts/cli run lint
